thread.title: Police: Waukegan man charged with driving without a license - Glencoe News
thread.title_full: Police: Waukegan man charged with driving without a license - Glencoe News

author: Pioneer Press
title: Police: Waukegan man charged with driving without a license - Glencoe News
text:
The following items were taken from Glencoe Public Safety Department reports and press releases. An arrest does not constitute a finding of guilt.
DRIVING WITHOUT A LICENSE
Andre C. Felton, 51, of the 2100 block of Elmwood Road, Waukegan, was charged with driving without a license and speeding after he was stopped near the intersection of Green Bay Road and Hawthorn Avenue at 12:39 p.m. Sept. 27, police said. He was released on a $1,500 bond and has a scheduled court date of Nov. 5 in Skokie.
